response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the finest materials and attention to detail, ensuring it stands out in its category. I understand that the value of this product may be subjective, but I believe it's worth more than just financial exchange. However, for the purpose of facilitating a transaction, I propose an offer of $1,000,000 for the product. This amount reflects a generous discount considering the product's quality and potential benefits to you. I look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your business or personal endeavors. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact me. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1000000}
